name: SHOCKING: Is EgyptAir Business Class Really That Bad?
description:
Go check out Rosetta Stone limited time deals today: https://www.rosettastone.co.uk/trektrendy/ 

I'm going to find out what EgyptAir is really like. Looking at the reviews... it's not good! Many report issues with cleanliness, upkeep of the cabin (broken seats!) and overall just not offering good value. 

I'll be trying out their Business Class on their brand new Airbus A220 over to Aswan in Northern Egypt.  

My buddy @jamesasquith5779https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqU2YGi4Jcdlx8sHsq0VRVQ

-----------
